<Heading as={"h1"} className={"openapi__heading"} children={"Eliminar un dominio personalizado"} />

<MethodEndpoint method={"post"} path={"/deployments/{deployment_name}/delete_custom_domain"} context={"endpoint"} />

Elimina un dominio personalizado de un despliegue.


<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Solicitud"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"deployment_name","in":"path","description":"Nombre del despliegue","required":true}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Cuerpo"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","required":["requestDestination","domain"],"properties":{"domain":{"type":"string","description":"El nombre del dominio personalizado que se va a eliminar."},"requestDestination":{"description":"El destino de este dominio personalizado (convexCloud o convexSite).","type":"string","enum":["convexCloud","convexSite"],"title":"RequestDestination"}},"title":"PlatformDeleteCustomDomainArgs"}}},"required":true}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}

</StatusCodes>
